price: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang telah pasti terhadap mereka kalimat Tuhan-mu, tidaklah akan beriman706,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: 706.  Kalimat di sini berarti "ketetapan" .  Maksud ayat ini ialah orang-orang yang telah ditetapkan Allah dalam Lawḥ Maḥfūẓ bahwa mereka akan mati dalam kekafiran; selamanya tidak akan beriman.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ḥaqqat ʿalayhim kalimatu rabbika lā yu'minūna
